snippet: OTTENSTEIN--Howard K. June 21, 1930 - March 4, 2016. A proud U.S. Marine Corps. Veteran, Howard is survived by his devoted wife Marcia, beloved children David (Patty), Meryl, and Steven (Karen), his loving sister Lila, and adored grandchildren Cori, Jared, Isla and Mason. He will be missed by all. 1/3
